Current participating Headstand schools report:                        60% drop in school suspensions79% students report significantly less perceived stress84% students report frequent use of stress reduction techniques100% surveyed staff highly recommend Headstand   
Headstand has been features on CBS National news, The Atlantic and several other media outlets. 

The Mindfulness Challenge 
Kids and teachers are bombarded with information and stress with the pressures of academic achievement, an ever evolving technological world and a society which all too often values business over interpersonal connection.  
If we know mindfulness meditation is proven to positively change the brain in MRI imaging, why aren't we teaching it in school?   
The simple truth is, most educators and administrators don't believe there is enough time in the day to fit in mindfulness meditation and yoga techniques and we don't blame them, we've been there. As former educators ourselves, we want to fix this problem. We know immersing ourselves deeply into school culture to build an innovative mindfulness and yoga lab works.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Please get the word out and share our campaign
Spread the word! Follow Headstand on Facebook and Instagram
Join our day-long Summit at the Google HQ campus in Mountain View on 1/27/18
Interested in volunteering? Email shyla@headstand.org
Keep an eye out for our donation-based yoga classes happening in San Francisco in the coming months
Use the indiegogo share tools to spread the word and let others know they can be a part of the change to build a more mindful, peaceful future
campaign_city: San Francisco Bay Area, United States

story:
We are living in the exciting booming of wireless technological world where the 5th Generation Cellular Mobile Communications (5G), Artificial Intelligence (AI), and Internet of Things (IoT) are becoming more prominent in our everyday life.  And Education is important for people of all ages to learn more about the new technologies, especially for the 5G mmWave Sensor; and we are attacking this issue by taking out the mmWave complexity away from the users, and offering a simple-to-use BATMAN BM101 mmWave Sensor Solution Evaluation Kit (the Batman Kit) with Integrated Hardware & Software Solution that can be experimented and applied to various applications. 

 

Where the Batman Kit is for:

  • Technologically inclined engineering professors & students, scientists, electronics hardware & software engineers, automotive engineers and technologists, electronics hobbyists, etc.
  • For a Novice, the user may follow the included sample App via Bluetooth wireless connectivity to iPhone/iPad to gain mmWave Sensor’s practical experience.
  • For an Intermediate User, the user may apply the Batman Kit for the Target Application by connecting the Kit to a Raspberry Pi computer, and designing Python software based on the included SDK.
  • For an Advanced User, the user may utilize The Batman Kit as mmWave Sensor End Device for AI+IoT application with Deep Learning

 

And that a Batman Kit package includes:

  • A Small & Compact application dedicated mmWave Sensor Module based on Texas Instruments (TI) IWR1642 76GHz~81GHz mmWave ASIC , with pin-connection for UART communication.
  • A Raspberry Pi-Hat Board with optional JBT24M Bluetooth Module (included for the backers of this Indiegogo Campaign!); and that this Hat Board can also work independently of a Raspberry Pi Computer for connecting the mmWave Sensor Module to other MCU based Hardware Board such as an Arduino Board, etc.
  • A Python SDK on GitHub available for developing software on Raspberry Pi and other computers, which is a perfect companion for AI + IoT Integration Implementation

 

While, we are offering three different “flavors” of mmWave Sensor Module with pre-programmed Firmware dedicated to the given evaluation application-flavor of your choice:

  • The First Module is built-in with Vital Signs Detection Firmware; for a contactless and wearableless and 30cm ~ 90cm (about 1~3 feet) distance detection of Vital Signs (Heartbeat Rate & Respiration Rate) of a person, a pet, or an animal.
  • The Second Module is built-in with People Movement Behavior Trigger Firmware; for detecting People movement in a 4 x 4 meter or 16 meter square area (or about 172 square feet), and with software that could set virtual geo-fence(s) to trigger alert or action when People are moving into the geo-fence(s).
  • The Third Module is built-in with High Accuracy Measurement Firmware; for measuring object distance from the mmWave Sensor Module with the range of 30cm ~ 3meters (about 1~10 feet) with millimeter resolution.
 
 

Vital Signs Detection

 

 

 

People Movement Behavior

 

 

 

High Accuracy Measurement

 

 

Note: each of the Batman Kit comes with ONLY ONE mmWave Sensor Module of the dedicated application flavor.

And you may explore other mmWave Sensor application possibilities once you have the understanding on how the mmWave Sensor works; such as in areas of Education, Engineering, Science, Automotive, Industrial, Medical, and Business & Consumer applications.

 

 

On hardware technical side, the Batman Kit’s mmWave Sensor Module is based on state of the art Texas Instruments IWR1642 Single Chip 76GHz ~ 81GHz ASIC with built-in RF Front End having two Transmission and four Receiving Antennae, along with the built-in C674x DSP for high performance FMCW Signal Processing, and also with the built-in ARM Cortex R4F Microcontroller for Configuration, Control, and Calibration; while we provide a direct Raspberry Pi pin-connectivity via our Raspberry Pi-Hat Board (which you may also use it to connect to Arduino or other MCU Boards with physical wiring) for UART communication on interface side. 

On Software side, the Batman Kit’s mmWave Sensor Firmware facilitates the complex higher physics and higher mathematics raw data analysis (with real-time Fast Fourier Transform, FFT) with robust algorithms that transform the massive & complicated real-time raw data into easy to understand parameter values such as Range, Angle, and Velocity (or Distance, Heartbeat & Respiration Rate pending Firmware programmed) as the output of mmWave Sensor, which will be pipelined as the input for user’s application (via UART communication).  In addition, the Batman Kit includes iOS and Python Open Source SDK that allow the user to implement faster on programming the corresponding software on iPhone/iPad and/or Raspberry Pi computer for Vital Signs Detection, People Movement Behavior Trigger, or High Accuracy Measurement.

 

      

The Python SDK can accept either mmWave Sensor’s Raw-Data or Key-Data from Firmware on TI IWR1642 (via UART Tx/Rx); while the iOS SDK can only accept Key Data from Firmware on TI IWR1642 ASIC (via Bluetooth).  The Python SDK with Raw-Data provides an abundant high speed mmWave raw sensing data that allows the user to work on post processing for an application on a Raspberry Pi Computer (which is a very popular programmable computer platform for teachers and students, that has sold over 23Million units in about 6-years span to end of year 2018; and with tens of thousands young people, teachers, and hobbyists alike engaging in programming and learning digital skills). And the Key-Data for both Python SDK and iOS SDK provides an easy to understand with simplified mmWave sensing data for direct output to a Raspberry Pi Computer or an iPhone/iPad; which will serve as a quick introduction to mmWave Sensor world for those without getting deeply into programming.

 

    

In addition, the Batman Kit is a perfect companion for AI+IoT integration implementation.  The Batman Kit can be used as an IoT Sensor End Device, that collects Sensor parameter values to Cloud for Sensor info sharing & analysis.  Moreover, the collected Sensor data can be aggregated to become Big Data suitable for AI/Machine Learning/Deep Learning for further application analysis; and for applications such as: Faulty Motor Vibration Symptom Diagnosis & Categorization for Industrial and Automotive applications, Vital Signs’ Emergency Level Categorization for Healthcare applications, Gesture Type Identification & Categorization for Business and Consumer applications, Object & Obstacle Type Identification & Categorization for various Education, Engineering, and Science applications, etc.

 

The Batman Kit will guide you into the mmWave Sensor world with simplicity, and will lead you into exploring more mmWave Sensor application possibilities.

 

 

Specifications:

mmWave Sensor Evaluation Module

FMCW Transceiver
  • Integrated PLL, Transmitter, Receiver, Baseband, and A2D
  • 76- to 81-GHz Coverage With 4-GHz Continuous Bandwidth
  • Four Receive Channels
  • Two Transmit Channels
  • Ultra-Accurate Chirp (Timing) Engine Based on Fractional-N PLL
  • TX Power: 12.5 dBm
  • RX Noise Figure:
    14 dB (76 to 77 GHz), 15 dB (77 to 81 GHz)

Built-in Calibration and Self-Test (Monitoring)
  • ARM® Cortex® -R4F-Based Radio Control System
  • Built-in Firmware (ROM)
  • Self-calibrating System Across Frequency and Temperature

DSP
  • C674x DSP for FMCW Signal Processing

MCU
  • ARM Cortex-R4F Microcontroller for Application Control

I/O
  • SPI / CAN x 1
  • Up to 2 UARTs
  • I 2C x 1
  • GPIO: 0 ~ 2

Antenna
  • Tx Antenna x 2 on Board
  • Rx Antenna x 4 on Board

Pre-Programmed Firmware “Flavor”
  • Vital Signs Detection (VSD) Firmware; for 30cm ~ 90cm wireless & contactless detection of Heartbeat & Respiration Rate
  • High Accuracy Measurement (HAM) Firmware; for 30cm ~ 300cm distance measurement with millimeter resolution
  • People Movement Behavior (PMB) Firmware; for detecting People Movement in 4m x 4m or 16 meter-square region for setting geo-fence(s) trigger action
Note: ONLY one of VSD, HAM, or PMB Firmware is pre-programmed within a single mmWave Module within a single Batman Kit.

Operating Temperature & Operating Humidity
  • 0° to 40° degree Celsius
  • 10 ~ 85% Non-Condensing

Dimensions & Weight
  • 54mm x 46mm; 14 grams net
   

 

 

mmWave Raspberry Pi Hat

Connector
  • Matching mmWave Module Female Connector
  • Matching Raspberry Pi GPIO Female Connector
  • Micro USB Power Connector
  • Jumpers for Bluetooth Tx/Rx or Raspberry Pi Tx/Rx Selection
  • Jumper for mmWave Raw Data or Key Data Selection

     

Bluetooth (optional)

  • Joybien JBT24M Bluetooth Low Energy Module
    (Note: included for this Indiegogo Campaign for FREE)

Micro USB Input Power
  • 5VDC, 2Amp.
    (Note: Power Adapter and Micro USB Cable NOT included)

Operating Temperature
& Operating Humidity
  • 0° to 40° degree Celsius
  • 10 ~ 85% Non-Condensing

Dimensions & Weight
  • 65.3mm x 56.3mm
  • 30 grams with JBT24M Bluetooth

              

iOS SDK & Python SDK   

Vital Signs Detection
  • https://github.com/bigheadG/mmWave

High Accuracy Measurement

  • https://github.com/bigheadG/mmWave

People Movement Behavior
  • https://github.com/bigheadG/mmWave

iOS mmWave Demo App
  • https://itunes.apple.com/tw/app/mmwaveapi/id144...
  • iOS SDK per request

*** Specifications subject to change without notice
Copyright © Joybien Technologies, Co., Ltd. 2019

Note:

* The Logos /Images/Trademarks shown within this campaign (including Apple iPhone/iPad/iOS, ARM, Bluetooth, GitHub, Python, Raspberry Pi, Texas Instruments, etc.),  are the Logos/Images/Trademarks of the respective companies and/or organizations.

** Apple iPhone/iPad & Raspberry Pi Computer not included.

*** The Batman Kit is based on TI IWR1642 mmWave ASIC design, and shall comply with TI policies for selling worldwide.

 

Project Management Timeline

We have completed all of our critical milestones from Concept, to Prototype, and now started mass production stage; where we have finished the hardware board designs for the product launch, and have finished on the fine-tuning of Firmware and SDK for the first Evaluation Kit release.  We  are ready launching this campaign where we have reliably accomplished the design & production considerations while the Evaluation Kit is more matured with stable quality.  And we have made quite a few breakthrough improvements for the Kit’s functionality with simplicity in mind for both Hardware and software SDK, so to make the overall solution simple to use.  We have started for the shipment in the first week of April 2019.

The Batman Kit in Production (April 2019)
 

Batman Kit in production (with mmWave Module and Hat Board)

The first stage of production is with PCBA SMT process; where we starts with Solder Paste printing of PCB Board, then with SMT Pick & Place of the components onto the PCB Board, then with Reflow-Oven for soldering components onto PCBA, and  then go through the quality inspection.

 
The second stage of production is with Wave Solder of connection-pins, along with inspection and touch-up of component soldering for both mmWave Module Board and the HAT Board.
 
 
 
 
The final stage of production is with the Batman Kit packaged in carton box, ready for shipment.

 

 

Our Team

Our team is in Taiwan with over 30 years of RF wireless electronic hardware & software/firmware & mechanical designs, and manufacturing test & production experience in the heart of the IT industry in Taiwan, and with over 7 years of working with over 100 IoT related designs & manufacturing projects

And for the Batman Kit, we have devoted our key team members to work on this project:

Larry Hsieh   -  CEO, Co-Founder & Product Manager

Zach Chen    -  Software RD VP, Co-Founder & Software SDK & App Team Lead

Kevin Wei    -  Hardware RD VP, Co-Founder & Firmware Team Lead

 

Future Challenges

We still have new challenges in front of us, where your supports will be greatly appreciated to keep our momentum going for completing Batman Kit tests (on Hardware, Software, and the integration test sides), material procurement & production, Batman Kit marketing promotion, as well as for devoting further engineering resources for the continuous improvements with establishing Batman mmWave Community, and exploring more applications for mmWave sensor implementations.

 

Backers Plan

Your contributions will allow us to realize BATMAN BM101 mmWave Sensor Solution Evaluation Kit on market sooner; which will benefit all of us interested in the new technologies to keep up with the trend and have the overall understanding.

You may contribute and support us by:

Physical Perk Backing:

  • Get 1 Vital Signs Detection (VSD) based Batman Kit Package with 30% discount( List Price: US$285; Indiegogo Price: U$199 )
  • Get 1 People Movement Behavior (PMB) based Batman Kit Package with 30% discount ( List Price: US$285; Indiegogo Price: U$199 )
  • Get 1 High Accuracy Measurement (HAM) based Batman Kit Package with 30% discount ( List Price: US$285; Indiegogo Price: U$199 )
  • Get all three Batman Kits (with VSD & PMB & HAM) in a Bundled Pack with 36% discount ( List Price: US$855; Indiegogo Price: U$539 )

Share the News:

  • Share the Batman Kit news with your Teachers & Students & Friends with Indiegogo Share Tools.
  • Share with us on how you use the Batman Kit (and we will share it later on the the Batman Kit Development Community to be established); or let us know what other application Firmware and SDK that you’d like us to work on.

 

Contact Us

If you have any questions or comments, please e-mail us at: larry_hsieh@joybien.com

 

Thank You !

story:
The Pig Preserve was founded a number of years ago to test a new model of care for rescued farm animals…specifically pigs. Drawing on our 20+ years of experience of running a “traditional” pig sanctuary at that time, we believed that we could create a natural and free environment for rescued pigs of all breeds that would allow the pigs to live “life on their terms” rather than in the confined spaces of barns, stalls and small pens. My wife and I began rescuing miniature pigs around 1988 or 89 on an acre and a half of land. After several years we moved to a 17-acre piece of land in Northern VA where we started our first “official” sanctuary…Mini-Pigs, Inc. In 2005 we relocated from Northern VA to a 100-acre piece of land in the Cumberland Mountains of Middle TN where we began building The Pig Preserve. Our goal was to create, for all breeds of pigs, a sanctuary where rescued pigs could have the freedom to live their lives in as natural an environment as we could create for them. Unlike more traditional sanctuaries, we wanted to create a model that allowed the pigs to roam, forage, graze, engage in natural behaviors and, most importantly, form their own social groups. With an equal mix of lush pastures, deep woods and four spring-fed ponds, pigs living here are never penned and are able to explore the entire sanctuary property. Barns and
shelters are provided for each individual social group…currently 24 shelters are in use. The pigs
are fed a custom-made, all-natural grain feed daily, which contains no chemicals, preservatives
or additives other than diatomaceous earth…a natural product for controlling parasites. The
Pig Preserve goes to extraordinary lengths to cater to the needs of the pigs and to allow them
to live their lives on their terms. It is a unique sanctuary model for farmed animals and one that
has gotten a great deal of positive interest not only in the US but from several countries in
Europe and Central and South America as well.

The 100-acre pristine land in the mountains of Tennessee is a perfect blend of pastures, deep woods and spring-fed ponds where the pigs can roam, root, graze, forage and…possibly most importantly…form their own social groups. The 170 or so rescued pigs…a mixture of huge farm pigs, shy feral pigs (wild boars) and miniature pigs…enjoy a healthy, happy, safe and largely human-free existence. They live their lives as nature intended them to live, supervised by a small, dedicated staff of caretakers who see to their daily care and feeding and tend to their medical needs while maintaining the facility in a natural and pristine state. The result is a population of rescued pigs who, despite prior lives of trauma, abuse, maltreatment and fear of death, are healthy, happy, long-lived and extremely well-adjusted animals. They are truly living "life on their terms”.

As our population has grown, the need to expand the facility has become more critical. Can you help us with our most immediate goals?

*EXPANSION - Increase the amount of land available for the pigs taking advantage of several areas of the existing property that have not yet been fenced and made available to the pigs.

*MEDICAL/QUARANTINE BARN - Establish a dedicated quarantine and “sick pig” facility both to house new arrivals who need veterinary care and to care for our pigs as they age and become infirmed. This area would also serve as a quarantine area for incoming pigs and could accommodate the occasional rescued piglets or very young pigs until they are old enough to join the general pig population safely.

*WELCOME CENTER - Create a modest welcome and education center for our growing number of visitors from around the world and increase our vegan outreach program. This is a fantastic opportunity to dovetail the mission and the magic that is The Pig Preserve, an all-vegan campus, with strong advocacy for a plant-based lifestyle that should not be allowed to slip through our fingers.

*COMPASSION CENTER - Build a covered outdoor space that has unlimited potential for educational and fundraising opportunities. We will be able to host special groups, yoga classes, weddings, etc.

"After running a pig sanctuary for almost 20 years, I knew the pigs in my care were safe, loved,
well-fed and well-cared for. The question that nagged me constantly was “Are they happy?”
So…I asked the pigs what they wanted and they told me: “We want the gift of freedom…we
want to live our lives on our terms”. So that is what I set out to provide for them as I began
building The Pig Preserve…a sanctuary that allowed the pigs to live their lives in as natural a
setting as I could provide for them."          ~Richard Hoyle, Founder

"I knew from the first minute I laid eyes on the sanctuary, that I would be lucky to make this place my rescue home. The energy here is peaceful and calm. The animals are content and spend their days however they choose to. And just in showing us who they are, they teach us such important lessons about life, love and everything in between."          ~Afton Hughes, Farm Manager

We are the largest pig sanctuary in the country, and we have been rescuing pigs for over 30 years now. We have a successful program with limitless potential for growth, and we are so excited to see what we can do together! If you are unable to contribute, but you like what we do - please consider sharing our campaign with others that may be interested. You can share here through Indiegogo!
story_txt:
The Pig Preserve was founded a number of years ago to test a new model of care for rescued farm animals…specifically pigs. Drawing on our 20+ years of experience of running a “traditional” pig sanctuary at that time, we believed that we could create a natural and free environment for rescued pigs of all breeds that would allow the pigs to live “life on their terms” rather than in the confined spaces of barns, stalls and small pens. My wife and I began rescuing miniature pigs around 1988 or 89 on an acre and a half of land. After several years we moved to a 17-acre piece of land in Northern VA where we started our first “official” sanctuary…Mini-Pigs, Inc. In 2005 we relocated from Northern VA to a 100-acre piece of land in the Cumberland Mountains of Middle TN where we began building The Pig Preserve. Our goal was to create, for all breeds of pigs, a sanctuary where rescued pigs could have the freedom to live their lives in as natural an environment as we could create for them. Unlike more traditional sanctuaries, we wanted to create a model that allowed the pigs to roam, forage, graze, engage in natural behaviors and, most importantly, form their own social groups. With an equal mix of lush pastures, deep woods and four spring-fed ponds, pigs living here are never penned and are able to explore the entire sanctuary property. Barns andshelters are provided for each individual social group…currently 24 shelters are in use. The pigsare fed a custom-made, all-natural grain feed daily, which contains no chemicals, preservativesor additives other than diatomaceous earth…a natural product for controlling parasites. ThePig Preserve goes to extraordinary lengths to cater to the needs of the pigs and to allow themto live their lives on their terms. It is a unique sanctuary model for farmed animals and one thathas gotten a great deal of positive interest not only in the US but from several countries inEurope and Central and South America as well.
The 100-acre pristine land in the mountains of Tennessee is a perfect blend of pastures, deep woods and spring-fed ponds where the pigs can roam, root, graze, forage and…possibly most importantly…form their own social groups. The 170 or so rescued pigs…a mixture of huge farm pigs, shy feral pigs (wild boars) and miniature pigs…enjoy a healthy, happy, safe and largely human-free existence. They live their lives as nature intended them to live, supervised by a small, dedicated staff of caretakers who see to their daily care and feeding and tend to their medical needs while maintaining the facility in a natural and pristine state. The result is a population of rescued pigs who, despite prior lives of trauma, abuse, maltreatment and fear of death, are healthy, happy, long-lived and extremely well-adjusted animals. They are truly living "life on their terms”.
As our population has grown, the need to expand the facility has become more critical. Can you help us with our most immediate goals?
*EXPANSION - Increase the amount of land available for the pigs taking advantage of several areas of the existing property that have not yet been fenced and made available to the pigs.
*MEDICAL/QUARANTINE BARN - Establish a dedicated quarantine and “sick pig” facility both to house new arrivals who need veterinary care and to care for our pigs as they age and become infirmed. This area would also serve as a quarantine area for incoming pigs and could accommodate the occasional rescued piglets or very young pigs until they are old enough to join the general pig population safely.
*WELCOME CENTER - Create a modest welcome and education center for our growing number of visitors from around the world and increase our vegan outreach program. This is a fantastic opportunity to dovetail the mission and the magic that is The Pig Preserve, an all-vegan campus, with strong advocacy for a plant-based lifestyle that should not be allowed to slip through our fingers.
*COMPASSION CENTER - Build a covered outdoor space that has unlimited potential for educational and fundraising opportunities. We will be able to host special groups, yoga classes, weddings, etc.
"After running a pig sanctuary for almost 20 years, I knew the pigs in my care were safe, loved,well-fed and well-cared for. The question that nagged me constantly was “Are they happy?”So…I asked the pigs what they wanted and they told me: “We want the gift of freedom…wewant to live our lives on our terms”. So that is what I set out to provide for them as I beganbuilding The Pig Preserve…a sanctuary that allowed the pigs to live their lives in as natural asetting as I could provide for them."          ~Richard Hoyle, Founder
"I knew from the first minute I laid eyes on the sanctuary, that I would be lucky to make this place my rescue home. The energy here is peaceful and calm. The animals are content and spend their days however they choose to. And just in showing us who they are, they teach us such important lessons about life, love and everything in between."          ~Afton Hughes, Farm Manager
We are the largest pig sanctuary in the country, and we have been rescuing pigs for over 30 years now. We have a successful program with limitless potential for growth, and we are so excited to see what we can do together! If you are unable to contribute, but you like what we do - please consider sharing our campaign with others that may be interested. You can share here through Indiegogo!

story:
WHAT IS OUR IMPACT?

In our research, 48% of students surveyed said they were intimidated by the idea of searching for financial aid. The tops reasons being:

  • Lack of direction in searching for scholarships
  • Overwhelmed by the number of resources
  • Confused by the lending process

This data reinforces the need for Minorities to Majorities! 

Minorities to Majorities is a mobile app-based platform connecting underrepresented students and women with access to scholarships, internships and fellowships across the country. We are the opportunity app for students! And each day we embark on a mission to transform lives through opportunities!

We hope you are as excited as us about this journey!

 

WHY ARE WE RAISING?

We are raising funds to develop our second generation mobile app in order to expedite the scholarship, internship and fellowship search and application process for students through the utilization of AI, customized software and an improved algorithm. Our aim is to scale our platform and mobile app into the leading educational and professional platform connecting students to opportunities across the globe.

We plan to optimize our mobile app and platform through the following methods:

  • Develop an advanced algorithm with improved search and filtering functionality to provide users with curated experiences
  • Build a web compatible platform to accompany the mobile app, improving user accessibility
  • Leverage artificial intelligence to continuously populate our opportunities database  
  • Hire an enterprise development team to design, build and configure the app

Manufacturing of our second generation app will require the composition of wire frames, the design of architecture and product development. In order to ensure successful product development, we also need to hire an experienced enterprise development team to design, build and configure the app.

With your support we can continue our mission of creating the largest scholarship and internship database for underrepresented students and women across the country and the globe. Scaling and further development will also enable us to better serve students, by creating a mobile app which is easier  to navigate, offers individual content and contains an expanded database.

Through our growth we are not only aiding students, but also helping corporations and institutions of higher learning meet their huge diversity gaps. We are the pipeline reducing the gap between access and opportunity and connecting skilled underrepresented students and women with the educational and professional opportunities they deserve.

WHAT ARE THE REWARDS FOR CONTRIBUTING?

In return for supporting us you or a deserving student can receive...

  • Full Registration to the 2019 Grace Hopper Celebration in Orlando, Florida
  • Full Registration to Afrotech 2019
  • 30 Min One-On-One College and/or Career Advising Session
  • Exclusive 30 Minute Video Call with the the MTM founder
  • 3 one hour sessions for tech startup consulting with Jet Constellations.
  • Access to Highly Sought MTM Scholarship Workshop
  • MTM: the Ultimate Scholarship Guide eBook
  • Listing on our website’s “MTM Hero Page”

Risks/Challenges

Most of our risks and challenges are behind us. We have already launched a successful mobile app which is still currently available from the Apple App Store and Google Play. Our first generation app is currently being used in countries all over the world including the United States, Nigeria and India to name a few.

Our team has experiences spanning from educational and financial consulting to technical development to high school and college advising. Our combined experience has provided us with advanced knowledge of the college application and financial aid process, as well as app development and production.  Users have enjoyed benefiting from our first generation mobile app for the past two years and were able to identify and apply for amazing educational and professional opportunities. Throughout these two years, we have improved our current app based on the feedback of our users and changing trends in the education market. Now, we are ready to bring our remodeled and improved mobile app to you. This app is for students and parents everywhere and all it’s going to take is your support.

At this point, we have only one last hurdle and that is production of our next generation mobile app. We have committed many months to conducting focus groups and market studies, building wire frames and creating prototypes. We have very exacting standards because developing the core functionality and code for our next generation app can be demanding. Luckily, we have identified an experienced team of developers who can manufacture our mobile app to our standards with a quick turnaround time.

In hopes of reducing the time before we can begin production, we are counting on you. Your support will help us take our next steps into production, but most importantly your aid will help connect students with an increased number of educational and professional opportunities!

SUPPORT US

We understand that not everyone can contribute to our campaign, but you can still help us my sharing this campaign with your friends, family and social networks! Please use the share tools below!

We know you all have a lot of questions, so we’ll keep an open line of communication with you all through the comments sections and we will provide occasional updates to let you know where we are.

Please learn more about MTM at http://minoritiestomajorities.com/

 

Follow us on Social Media 

  • Facebook: @MinoritiesToMajorities
  • Twitter: @MTMajorities
  • Instagram: @MinoritiesToMajoritiesApp
  • LinkedIn: Minorities to Majorities, LLC

story:
Each little girl here has been saved from a terrible future, and is now safely ensconsed in this shelter. Here they are slowly learning to become caring, intelligent beings, who will be capable of helping others when they grow up,

You can contribute to their growth and evolution by making a contribution here. Thank you for your kindness.

More about us...

New Hope Nepal is a shelter for girls rescued from being kidnapped and forced into unpleasant futures. Many of them would have ended up in brothels or dance bars across the border.

We, at New Hope, are dedicated to saving as many girls as possible, and providing them a safe shelter and education.

The need for funds is felt greatly now, as the earthquake has played havoc with our shelter and we need to build a new home. Your contribution, of as little as Rs. 500, will make a big difference to all of us here.

Thank you again. 


Facts and figures

Every year over 15,000 Nepali girls are kidnapped or sold and taken across the border of Nepal into a life of forced prostitution.

New Hope Ministries rescues girls that are imminantly at risk of sexual exploitation. The girls that we rescue are from 5 to 17 years of age. We have been rescuing girls from various places in Nepal, including the Nepal border. Some of these girls were being trafficked into sex slavery, some were employed at dance bars, and others were imminently at risk for sexual exploitation.

At New Hope Girls’ Home, we provide for everything that will enable these girls to grow happy, healthy and successful. Our girls receive a quality education that will enable them to thrive as adults. With providing for the girls’ mental and physical needs, we also believe in developing the child’s spirit through daily discipleship.

As current facility is not safe after earth quake, New hope is looking of safe shelter for girls. help us build one.

story:
Camp Thunderbird South Dakota’s aim is to implement fun, targeted programming that provides participants a chance to practice academic skills during the summer.  We work with incredible youth on the Pine Ridge, Rosebud, Lower Brule, and Standing Rock reservations across South Dakota (Learn more about where we work: http://campthunderbirdsd.org/where-we-work/). These places comprise of some of the poorest counties in the United States with youth suicide rates that are ten times the national average, yet we have seen that students can do amazing things when they are given the chance to explore and lead. 

Camp Thunderbird offers a structured, safe place to take risks, learn, build life skills, and realize personal strengths, offsetting the limited opportunities available in these remote and rural areas during the summer.  Frustratingly, students’ here face an academic achievement gap of two to three grade levels. Camp Thunderbird fosters concrete goal-setting skills and self-affirmation, which has been shown to have positive, lasting effects on academic achievement, especially for children most at risk (Cohen et al. 2010 SCIENCE).

Founded and operated by current and previous educators with personal relationships to our students, Camp Thunderbird combines community service; outdoor, cultural, and art education; team building; resiliency; and a brief college stay; all structured to inspire campers to set ambitious long-term goals and to concretely link skills learned at camp to their lives.

Since 2008 we have conducted seven camps. In response to community demand, we expanded from offering just one week-long camp for third through fifth graders, to providing a second camp for middle-school children. In doing so, we more than doubled our participation from 20 to 43 campers and provided continuity for previous campers who would have "aged out." 2015 was also special in that we hired four local high school students, to their first job ever, as junior counselors! We did this thanks to several individual donations, grassroots fundraising events, and grants. We need your help to do it again! (See pictures from previous camps: http://campthunderbirdsd.org/galleries/)

We have a great bunch of volunteers that develop programming, take care of administration needs (http://campthunderbirdsd.org/meet-the-board/), and work on fundraising throughout the year. More than 95% of our budget is devoted to camp -- lodging, stipends for volunteer directors and counselors, junior counselors activities, and transportation. 

This year, we plan to hire four high school junior counselors to continue developing their leadership confidence and job skills. We will cover the cost for their camp activities, as well as paying them a small stipend for their time during camp, as well as the 20+ hours of camp training and set up before Camp Thunderbird. 

  • Stipend per junior counselor is $200 per week: $1600.
  • Stipend per adult counselor is $250 per week: $2000.
  • Stipend per co-director is $750 per week: $3000. 

In addition to staffing costs, the distances in South Dakota are long, so transportation is one of our greatest expenses. 

  • Cost of renting two 15-passenger vans for 2 weeks plus insurance: $6,490.00 
  • Cost of renting a staff van for two weeks plus insurance: $800. 
  • Current gas prices in SD are approximately: $2.00 per gallon
  • Gas mileage for a 15 passenger van: 11-17 mpg

Estimated fuel costs for two weeks of camp (including staff training, prep, and clean up days): $2,800

The real fun begins when we are engrossed in camp activities. This year, we are synthesizing team building with college readiness by providing a variety of new experiences. For example we will be

-Going to the Black Hills State University for a college visit $15/camper;
-Going to Devils Tower in Wyoming with ranger led hike $5/camper;
-Giving the 6-8th grade students choice days, where they can choose an art option, an athletic option, or a science/tech based option $10/camper;
-Partnering with local community events (movies in the park with college students, going to downtown booths in Spearfish, and participating in local tours). 

To provide our campers with the great experiences South Dakota and Wyoming have to offer, we must drive AND hire a diverse staff with a multitude of prior skills and growth potential. We need your help to do that.

Thank you so much for considering our campaign and contributing as you can.

Wopila Tanka

story:
MY STORY

Homelessness and Poverty: 235,000 Canadians experience homelessness every year, many with mental health and addictions issues. While this can be described as a crisis in itself, global poverty can be much more extreme with limited education and school options for poor children being a leading the cause of continual poverty. As a Canadian youth I struggled and found myself continually helping people as I grew up, donating my time in shelters, talking with people in the street, or buying coffee and food for those in need.

When presented with education options I wanted to do more globally, and studied International Development, graduating with honors at York University. While I worked as a cook during my studies, I still had a lot of student loans and looked for work immediately. It was not that much later that I found an opportunity volunteering in Indonesia for a educational organization supporting poor children worked there for a year. This was great support for those experiencing poverty, but did nothing for my tuition loans and I found myself back in Canada looking for work to try and pay the bills.

Currently I work in transitional housing supporting previously homeless individuals with mental health and/or addictions. While the work can sometimes be difficult, I love and am proud of my work, recognizing the opportunities for personal growth provided to people in need, however I am left with little to cover the remaining student loans I have left. Sometimes I lay awake wondering how I can start my own family or afford decent housing myself?

My remaining tuition loans are just over $28,026 Canadian.

I find it difficult to ask for money, and do not expect anything for free. So I thought that I could pay it forward using the skills and experience I have. If you are willing to help me pay off my tuition loans, then I will donate more time, effort, and support into helping the homeless off the street. I can provide food and drink to those in need and welcome packages to those in transition. 

I also still go back to Indonesia as my wife is Indonesian. I can pay it forward to provide poor children with educational supplies, bikes, and perhaps even scholarships for higher education so that they can escape poverty.

So I am asking you to join me.Together we can do more globally and make a difference in the lives of people around the world. 

By helping me pay my tuition loans, you are providing options for improved quality of life for those individuals in Canada and the children and families of Indonesia. 

Choose your favorite contribution/reward combination from the right-side column, and let's work together to support those in need - and show you can make a difference! Lets put a dent in poverty.

Thank-you so much for reading and any support you offer.



Mike 

PS- If you cannot provide any funding then please help spread the word and share a link to my campaign.

Please support me and pay it forward

story:
Sandscribe For Ethiopia Film

The Sandscribe Foundation trains aspiring filmmakers in Ethiopia by sending filmmakers and educators on short-term trips, and by providing year-round training at our Addis Ababa base. Our founder, author|filmmaker Dhaba Wayessa, has lived in the USA for over 20 years but has never forgotten his dream: to give artists in Ethiopia the opportunities he was given.

Sandscribe has functioned on our founder's vision and pocketbook. Today we launch this campaign to raise $20,000 in development funds, so we can make the Sandscribe Dream a reality. And we need your help.

What Has Sandscribe Been Doing? 

  • Sending educators and filmmakers to train students in Addis. More..
  • Offering ongoing courses at our in-country base.
  • Launching a mentoring program between US filmmakers and Addis students
  • Starting an equipment donation program

What does Sandscribe want to do? (Read our full strategy here) 

  • STAGE ONE: Send a team at least once a year. Furnish Addis base with equipment. Partner with US film schools to donate streaming content.
  • STAGE TWO: Develop a fully functioning office and staff. Build a soundstage we can rent out. Offer a full schedule of courses year-round. 
  • STAGE THREE: Make Sandscribe a fully accredited film academy.
    And f    oster a vibrant filmmaking community and industry in Ethiopia!

What Do You Need?

Running a stage-two academy will cost about $160,000 per annum. Our current goal of $20K will fund our capital campaign. Our fund-raising team has solid, long-term relationships with studios, executives and philanthropists who fund projects like ours.  They've done a lot of pro bono work for us. These funds will enable them to dedicate their time to funding and endowing Sandscribe.

What's The Impact?

The current quality of filmmaking in Ethiopia is decent. But it has the potential to develop like Nigeria's Nollywood. Sandscribe alum, Kelbessa Megersa, created the TV series "Dheebuu," which runs twice a week on Ethiopia TV. More alumns are working. Let's give Ethiopia's filmmakers a chance to tell their stories.

What Do I Get?

You get to be awesome. We're offering great perks! Visit our website. Check out our photo and video galleries. Look at the students who are doing something they never imagined was within their reach. That’s who this is for. 

Where can I find out more?

Visit our website. Meet our team, faculty, and board.  Drop us an email. 
And please donate.

GOT EQUIPMENT?  Bring us your poor, your tired, your unused PCs, Macs and cameras, longing to be loved. We are a 501(c)(3) org. It's tax deductible. Email us.

GET THE WORD OUT! Tell your friends. Give us a shout-out on social media. Sandscribe is on Twitter and Facebook.

Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

In short...I need your help and support!

I was very excited about the new apple IOs and the new things that will come with it. Little did I know that when apple upgrades the IOS all apps need to be upgraded so that they are compatible with the new operating system. I got an email from the APP developer stating that I needed $3500 just to keep the APP alive.  And this $$$ was needed before the 16th or else the app goes off line. I.E. it dies!

I have always invested into my app and website. Initially I took a 'chunk' off my 401K to build the website. The app I was able to fund it out of the revenue generated by YouTube. However, at this time, I do NOT have the funds to upgrade the app. This is why I am doing this CROWDFUNDING, and why I need your help!

What We Need & What You Get

I need #3500 just to keep the APP alive.

But If YOU help me raise more money, I will turn the PRO version into the ONLY version of the APP and then release it for FREE for everyone to enjoy and benefit from it.

If If YOU help me raise enough money, I will have the developer work on the iPhone version of the APP. I was quoted $5K in the past to do this.

If you help me raise more than $10K I will have them release an ANDROID version of the app as well.

If all my FANS go WILD and we get OVER $10K....I will work on APP upgrades that are WAY overdue. Like a picture gallery, FACEBOOK login to the APP, so people can engage more, comment, and share. 

Do you have suggestions to make the APP more fun? Share it along with you donation and I will try to make it happen!

The Impact

to explain the impact of this crowding campaign is easy. I either raise the money or my APP dies! 

Risks & Challenges

I built this APP to help educate patients about disease conditions commonly encountered in the Emergency Department. As I built my video database, it became way more than just that. I now make medical videos to educate healthcare professionals about interesting cases, new articles, patient care issues, patient satisfaction and experience, and even emergency department management and ED flow.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, itthat doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Share on Facebook, Twitter, and any other Social Media you like.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
What We Do and Why We're on IGG

Hi! I am Paola, the founder and sole proprietor of Limno Consulting, a consulting & research firm founded in 2012 to provide solutions to mitigate or fix human-caused environmental problems in inland freshwater ecosystems. I founded Limno Consulting with the idea of doing environmental consultancy, which is my passion and was professionally trained on since graduate school, and at the same time conducting some hands-on academic-level research. The original idea was that the consultancy business would have funded the research.

Unfortunately I have been experiencing a business crunch as of lately, as the larger projects have run their courses but have not been replaced by new ones in the meantime. (We ecologists live in hard times.) The research part is thriving, though, with new articles being published at a pace of 2-3 per year -- not bad for a one-person business with no in-house help.

A current, regularly updated library of ecological literature is paramount in producing informed consulting reports as it is in producing academic-level publications. Unfortunately, my being in a constant hunt for new projects, maintaining the lab, and writing the papers means that my e-library of around 8000 (and counting) PDF articles has been progressively neglected and is now (dis)organized as several unconnected folders on my computer's hard drive. So, I need someone to help me reorganize my e-library -- not an easy task!

Here is the story in more detail:

  • First of all, let's frame the narrative. "Limno" refers to inland (freshwater) aquatic ecosystems, from lakes to ponds, wetlands, and streams of all sizes. So, limnology is de facto synonymous with inland (freshwater) aquatic ecology. As an ecologist, I need to integrate the biological and abiotic aspects of lake/stream ecology, though emphasis remains on the biological component, which is the component more sensitive to environmental changes. I am specialized on lake and, secondarily, stream ecosystems. I am a "lake doctor", trying to understand the causes behind some perceived lake problem, and find a "cure" once the problem has been diagnosed. Below is a view of (Lake) Østensjøvatn in the southeastern suburbs of Oslo, Norway, as an example of the type of ecosystems that I deal with. Although Østensjøvatn is a habitat for many species of water birds, it suffers from excessive inputs of algal nutrients (eutrophication) and therefore periodic algal blooms. Østensjøvatn has been the target of detailed studies to try to solve these problems. The lake is also infested with the non-native submerged plant Elodea canadensis, also the subject of several studies in which I was fortunate enough to participate as a research partner.

 
  • As a "lake doctor", I need to keep abreast of the current knowledge on how lake ecosystems work. At the same time, I do some hands-on ecological research myself. Both activities require maintaining a current, updated library of books and scientific articles from accredited scientific journals.
  • The main objective of Limno Consulting is twofold: provide and contribute to limnological know-how in aquatic environmental issues. I am also trying to expand Limno Consulting's mission to draw the attention of current and future college students to the ecology and management of inland ecosystems, the limited source of fresh/potable water for most of the world's human population. Please visit my professional website at http://www.limnoconsulting.com to learn more about limnology and what I do. If you are specifically interested in the research I do, you can visit my professional profile at ResearchGate (https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Paola_Lombardo), where you can also take a look at and download almost all that I have published so far. Both links open in a new window.
  • The scientific library at Limno Consulting currently hosts several books and around 8000 -- and counting -- scientific articles, mostly stored as environmentally-friendly PDF documents (no paper involved, so no need to kill trees). As Limno Consulting is a one-person business, I simultaneously serve as everything from janitor (the lab alone needs constant maintenance) to scientific director. As is often the case in situations like this, something gotta give, so my e-library has slowly turned into a disorganized storage of PDFs on my hard drive. Therefore, I need to hire somebody to help me sort through all this literature and reorganize the e-library, so that retrieving the needed information does not turn into a scavenging hunt every time I or my project partners need to consult a paper.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • All the funds raised will go into hiring a couple of persons to help me with the e-library reorganization and to renew a couple of annual subscriptions for scientific journals. The target amount also includes the estimated IGG platform and credit card fees.
  • In exchange for your generosity, I have put together some ecology- and limnology-themed perks. Check them out just below!
  • If this campaign does not reach the entire goal, I will hire only one person who will take the entire task on his/her shoulders, and/or I might forgo the journal subscriptions, depending on how much will be raised at the end of the campaign.
  • All perk claims will be fulfilled whether the goal is reached or not.
  • If the campaign raises funds in excess, the extra money will be used for additional journal subscriptions, annual dues for professional affiliations, and/or software upgrades.
  • Donations can be made via credit card or PayPal. Please be aware that as per PayPal rules, only 10 guest payments are allowed per card for donors within the European Union, i.e., a single credit card can only be used 10 times to check out as a guest. Please let me know if you encounter any problems while checking out.

 

The Perks!

Perks are limnology- and ecology-themed and include T-shirts, mouse pads, mugs, and the 2017 Limno Consulting wall calendar, just out of the printshop.

 

 

Shipping rates are kept to a minimum, and are included for most perks going within the European Union. Mugs need special handling and shipping fees are therefore a tad higher. All perks will be shipped via regular postal service as "priority mail" within Europe and as air mail or freight mail outside Europe, also depending on what options the Post Office gives me. If you need a faster delivery via private courier, please contact me before or at the moment of address confirmation (I will send you an e-mail for that), and I can arrange that for you. 

Most perks are offered as single or double packages. If you are interested in a "special" package, or in bulk quantities, or in anything that is not listed in the perk options on the right, please contact me before you claim the perk(s), and I will work out a convenient "bulk shipping rate" for you. The idea is to avoid surcharging for multiple credit card purchases and shipping rates, as IGG does not allow the lumping of multiple perks. Once we agree on the special package perk and shipping rate, you can just pledge the money amount in the "back it" window at the top right of the campaign page, and... wait for the package to reach you! "Bulk" packages may be shipped to you directly from the supplier in The Netherlands.  For single- and double-order perks, I will adopt shipping cycles of 10-15 claims, so popular perks may be shipped even before the expected shipping time of January or February 2017. Once a batch is fulfilled, I will contact you for T-shirt size or color, address confirmation, and any other necessary piece of information. For all claimed perks, shipping will follow a "first come, first served" basis.

If you have ideas or suggestions for perk variations or new perks, please contact me!

 

The 2017 Limno Consulting Wall Calendar

The "featured" perk is a small (two ~16 x 21 cm sheets to form a "long" A4 or legal size format when mounted) wall calendar with 12 unique photos of lakes, streams, or aquatic organisms taken and donated by seven different contributors from all over the world. My heartfelt thanks go to Paolo, Andy, Gianluigi, Marit, Viktor, and Daniel for sharing their beautiful pictures with me! (I am the seventh contributor.)

The calendar text is in English and does not report religious holidays to keep it neutral. Most other holidays and events (like daylight saving time and solstice and equinox times) apply to Europe, North America, and Australia/New Zealand -- i.e., where I expect most of the calendars to be shipped to. Sorry for those special events that I was forced to leave out for space constraints.

In order for you to receive the calendars a.s.a.p., they will be shipped within 2-5 days from your claim. While supplies last!

 

The "100%" Collection

 

The "100%" collection includes T-shirts, baseball caps, tote bags, mouse pads, and mugs. They are offered in two designs -- 100% limnologist and 100% ecologist -- that emphasize the science-based yet fun-loving spirit of all (aquatic) ecologists. The designs are unique and are an exclusive of this campaign -- you will not find them anywhere else!

 

 

T-shirts are in a unisex cut and come in either white or black 100% cotton. Black T-shirts come with a $5 surcharge as per supplier price list. Shirt brand is Fruit of the Loom or equivalent. Print matter and T-shirt live longer with a lukewarm or cold washing machine cycle and cloth line drying or "delicate cycle" machine drying. Please refer to the chart below to choose your T-shirt size. Please keep in mind that shirts may shrink slightly upon first washing cycle, so if your size is midway two of the offered sizes below, please round it up.

 

 

 

 

Mouse pads are 3-mm thick and with a full-color "100%" print on white background. The black background faded quickly on early tests and therefore black-background mouse pads are not offered here. The pad texture allows for smooth and precise mouse movements. (I have tested it for several months by now.)

 

 

Mugs are offered in both "100%" designs and in a unique "knowledge is power" design (also an exclusive of this campaign) specifically thought for teachers, students, and book lovers of all types. All mugs feature a full-color print on white background. Unfortunately mugs require special handling and therefore shipment fees are a bit higher for mugs and mug-containing perks.

 

 

Baseball caps are 100% cotton, with the "100%" design printed on white background. Open-top canvas tote bags also are 100% cotton, with the "100%" design printed on warm (creamy) white background.  Tote dimensions are 36 cm wide x 33 cm high (or 14 in w x 13 in h). Tote bags are washable in a delicate washing machine cycle at lukewarm or cold temperature.

Please see the updates page for details about the added perks (baseball caps and tote bags).

Please contact me before claiming any perk if you need special perk packages not included in the list on the right, so we can work out the cheapest possible shipping rate.

 

Annual Membership to The David Pakman Show

The David Pakman Show (TDPS) is an internationally syndicated, independent talk show focusing on news and politics based in Boston, Massachusetts (USA). TDPS airs on radio, television, and the internet, and on Free Speech TV via DirecTV and DISH Network. The almost daily (Mon-Fri) podcasts are available to a global audience on TDPS own website. Podcasts are posted daily at around midday (US time) or dinner time (European time). Check out the publicly available podcasts at http://www.davidpakman.com. Members enjoy daily 45-min commercial-free podcasts (audio and video) plus an additional 15-min bonus show, and several time-limited specials, periodically offered at TDPS.

Though based in the US, TDPS reaches out to a truly global audience. TDPS discusses all topics with a critical and open mind. TDPS also reports on and discusses science, especially those topics most involved in policy making and politics, like climate change (an example is at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ipqkspWFito&t=15s), the antivaccination movement (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_TUgJogftrE), and other hot topics (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zAe4fVtPsCs&index=19&list=PLVrg5xLmCvhH0n1ig7zyctR1bu3f6W_ou; a still valid 2012 clip), plus interviews with scientists (check out this 2012 interview with Neil DeGrasse Tyson at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=msZ790rgN7g&index=15&list=PLVrg5xLmCvhH0n1ig7zyctR1bu3f6W_ou). The TDPS YouTube channel offers science-based clips in a self-standing "Science and Technology" list.

Host David Pakman also personally interacts with his audience on a daily basis via his show and a plethora of social networks.

I am happy to offer a limited number of annual TDPS memberships at a 25% discounted price as a perk in my IGG campaign. First come, first served. For those who claim this perk, I will forward your names to TDPS and you will go from there. You might enjoy additional perks if you apply for membership when TDPS offers them (like, for example, the 2017 TDPS calendar on sale at the end of 2016). TDPS memberships run for a year starting from the time of first subscription, renewable after each 1-year cycle.

 

Referral Contest

You can still earn a perk if you cannot contribute, or you can add an extra perk if you have already claimed one (or more). You can do this by referring this campaign to your network of friends and coworkers via Twitter and/or Facebook. IndieGoGo tracks the contributions that stemmed from your referrals via a link to this campaign uniquely assigned to each individual referee.

The top three referrers will "win" a special perk:

  1. The top referrer will have collected the most contributions adding to at least US$ 500. Special perk: one "100%" complete set ("the works!" perk on the right), with no shipping fees.
  2. The second place referrer will have collected the second-highest contributions total adding to at least US$ 250. Special perk: one "100%" mini-set, with no shipping fees.
  3. Third place will go to the referrer with the third-highest contributions total adding to at least US$ 150.  Special perk: your choice of one mug or any two-item combinations excluding mugs (e.g., two t-shirts, t-shirts + mouse pad, t-shirt + cap, etc.), with no shipping fees.

In case of a tie within each prize category (e.g., if there are two referrers with >US$ 250 competing for second place), the higher dollar amount will win. In case of a dollar amount tie, the referrer with the higher number of contributions (or, secondarily, visits), will win. The "loser" will get the lower-tier prize (in this example, the third-place special perk). If two referrers are still tied as number of visits, they'll both get the higher special perk.

You need to have an IndieGoGo account to be a referrer.  Referrers promote this campaign with IGG’s share tools while logged into their IGG account. This is important because otherwise such a unique ID won’t be attached to any resulting contributions or visits. When you are logged into your IGG account and use IGG’s share tools to send a tweet, for example, the link in the tweet includes your unique ID. Then, when a new backer reads the tweet and clicks through the link to contribute, you are recognized as helping bring in the amount contributed by the new backer.

How to become a referrer:

1. Log into IndieGoGo - you must be logged in to receive credits for your referrals.

2. Visit the Limno Consulting campaign page (or -- log into IGG while you are on the Limno Consulting campaign page), where you can grab your unique link to the right side of the campaign introduction (above the perk list) by clicking the "link" button (the chain button highlighted with a cyan arrow):

 

You'll see a pop-up with the URL. Notice the numbers at the end -- that's how I know it's you referring your friends.

3. Copy the link and start sharing!

Use your link to share the campaign on social media, email, blog posts, etc.

For example, if you would like to share via Twitter, once you have copied the unique ID link, click on the "twitter" symbol, type a brief message, and include your unique ID link.

TWITTER EXAMPLE:"Support the Limno Consulting e-library campaign on @Indiegogo:  https://igg.me/at/LimnoCampaign2016/x/12345678"

* The '12345678' number on the end will be different for everyone, as that's your unique ID.

When anyone clicks on your unique link, they are taken to the Limno Consulting campaign page. If they back the campaign, they'll be added to your referral collection.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word!!  You are welcome to use the IGG share tools, your contact network, e-mail, social networks, tam-tam, smoke signals, or anything you like!

 

 

Thanks a lot for your support!

 

website: http://www.limnoconsulting.com

twitter: http://twitter.com/LimnoGeek1
